remarks: The conditional probability has values in ` [ 0 , 1 ] ` .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Dec-2016.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jan-2017.)
statement: cndprob01 $p |- ( ( ( P e. Prob /\ A e. dom P /\ B e. dom P ) /\ ( P ` B ) =/= 0 ) -> ( ( cprob ` P ) ` <. A , B >. ) e. ( 0 [,] 1 ) ) $.
